title: Python Developer
description: We are looking for a Python Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Strong understanding of Django, REST APIs, and databases is required.

title: Data Analyst
description: Seeking a Data Analyst with strong Python, SQL, and data visualization skills. Must be comfortable with data cleaning, transformation, and reporting.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Looking for a backend engineer with experience in building scalable RESTful services using Django or Flask. Knowledge of PostgreSQL and Redis is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Hiring a machine learning engineer with experience in Python, scikit-learn, and model deployment. Understanding of NLP and deep learning is a bonus.
